cast.overview: A cop who loses his partner in a shoot-out with gun smugglers goes on a mission to catch them. In order to get closer to the leaders of the ring he joins forces with an undercover cop who's working as a gangster hitman. They use all means of excessive force to find them.
cast.title: Hard Boiled

details.biography: Jameson Lam Wa-Fan (Chinese: 林華勳) is an actor, screenwriter and director. He entered the film industry in the late 1980s and participated in more than 100 films. In 1995, he wrote and directed the first film "Red Scary", which failed to achieve good results at the box office.
details.name: Jameson Lam Wa-Fan
